climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🏩 【Triple-Layered Comfort: Superior Safety and Softness】 Dive into the plush soft comfort of small moroccan area rugs, crafted with a 600g per square meter fabric density for an ultra-soft feel. The triple-layer build includes a TPE non-slip bottom to keep the carpet securely in place, ensuring top-notch safety and comfort in your home.Come and experience the softness of stepping on it with your bare feet!

🏩 【Built to Last: Premium Durability】 SERISSA geometric entryway rugs are designed to stand the test of time. Our rigorous six-step production process means each rug resists common issues like peeling, fading, and edge wear. They're built durable to retain their beauty through heavy use and high traffic.

🏩 【Easy Clean-Up: Stress-Free Maintenance】 Life gets messy, but SERISSA modern washable rugs are easy to keep clean. They're machine washable for hassle-free care and have superior color retention, ensuring they look new for years. Perfect for busy households and commercial settings alike.

🏩 【Stylish Choices: Diverse Designs】 From the bold flair of moroccan to the innovations patterns of geometric rugs, SERISSA offers a rich selection of colors and designs. Our rugs easily complement any interior decor, whether you're going for a modern or a other look.

🏩 【Fits Any Room: Size Versatility】 Whether you need a small rug for your entryway or a large one to anchor your living room, SERISSA has you covered with a variety of sizes. These contemporary trellis rugs bring warmth and style to any space, big or small.

🏩 【Innovative Packaging: Ready to Roll】 Forget about creases and folds. Our 2x3 silver grey throw rugs come in smooth, non-vacuum packaging so they lay flat and look great right out of the box. Your new carpet is ready to make an immediate impact in your space.

🏩 【Customer First: Dedicated Service】 With 8 years in the rug business, SERISSA is committed to customer satisfaction. Our customer service team is always ready to help with any issues, ensuring a positive experience with every purchase.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Avoid Excessive Moisture: When cleaning, use a moderate amount of water to avoid saturating the carpet. Excess moisture can lead to mold and mildew growth., Professional Cleaning: Schedule professional carpet cleaning at least once a year. This deep-cleaning process removes embedded dirt and allergens that routine vacuuming may not reach., Select the Right Cleaning Products: Use carpet cleaning products recommended by the carpet manufacturer. Avoid harsh chemicals that may damage the carpet fibers., Immediate Spot Cleaning:Attend to spills and stains promptly by blotting the affected area, avoiding rubbing, to prevent stains from setting. Utilize a mild cleaning solution suitable for carpets., Test Cleaning Products: Before applying any cleaning solution to the entire carpet, test it on a small, inconspicuous area to ensure it won't cause discoloration or damage., Regular Vacuuming: Make it a habit to vacuum your carpet regularly to prevent the accumulation of surface dirt and maintain a fresh appearance., Proper Ventilation: Ensure adequate ventilation during and after cleaning to expedite the drying process and prevent musty odors., Rotate Furniture: Periodically rotate furniture to prevent uneven wear and indentations on the carpet., Use Carpet Protectors: Consider applying carpet protectors to create a barrier against stains, making future cleaning more manageable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What sets this rug apart from others? This moroccan geometric rug is distinguished by its non-slip backing, easy maintenance, and OEKO-TEX certification, ensuring it's safe for your family and the environment. Can this modern rug be machine washed without any risk of discoloration? Offering endless convenience for every lifestyle, it's safe in the washing machine. Also for daily cleaning with broom, or wipe. Tips: Wash in cold water with mild detergent; Do not use chlorine or bleach; Tumble dry on low heat or lay to air dry. How does the non-slip feature benefit me? The high-quality non-slip backing ensures safety during daily use. It prevents slips and stumbles, making it ideal for households with kids, pets, and elderly family members. Your rug will stay securely in place. How to get rid of the creases? Maybe you can try these way: 1. Reverse roll the rug, let it sit for a day or two; 2. Flatten the rug by applying weight; 3. Apply carpet tape; 4. Place the rug outside in the sunlight for a few hours; 5. Use a clothing steamer. Why is there a color difference? 1. Different batches may have different colors, which is normal; 2. Due to the light and screen display, the color of the floor rug may have some chromatic aberration in different environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rug was a whole lot nicer than I expected. Very soft material. Love the looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition & so soft
reviews.reviewText: I painted my wood cabinets blue last year and have been looking for a sink rug that matches, this one is perfect! Soooo soft and surprisingly well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very attractive rug for small space
reviews.reviewText: This is an attractive rug and soft to the touch. I havent tried washing it yet so cannot speak to that aspect.I have it in a high traffic area between my mud room and kitchen and its holding up well. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super soft, great deal for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it so much I am ordering its "big brother."
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this product. It fits perfectly just inside the door leading out to my garage. It's very soft so it's easy on your feet. It's also absorbent and acts as the last line of defense for the more study wiping pads outside.The pattern and color coordinates well with area rugs we already had. It comes in a larger size that will be a perfect replacement for a well worn rug nearby.Even though it is very soft, it arrived folded up for shipping. It took a few weeks for the folds to naturally relax so that it would lay perfectly flat. Not really a big deal. Certainly not to the level of a tripping hazard. With that said, I would suggest that instead of folding it...maybe they could roll it up for shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful little rug. SOOOOOOO SOFT!
reviews.reviewText: This rug looks exactly like the picture you see online. What you don't see is how soft this rug is. If you have kids, they will love it for playing on the floor. And if you don't have kids, be prepared for your pets to take over because they love it, too.This is a plush rug with a crisp pattern stamped on it. I have washed this rug and the pattern stayed vibrant. It dries very quickly, then goes back to its place and stays put, thanks to a great backing. My rug does not even move when I try to push it with my foot. (On wooden floors)This can be vacuumed with a robot without budging. It can also be swept or taken outside and shaken. Even pet hair comes off easily since it stays on top of the short plush. I haven't used my regular vacuum on it.A bit of advice: Since water pools on this, I don't think it's a good idea to use it as a bathmat. I tried that and felt like the rug got a little slippery.Yes, I recommend this rug as an inexpensive but attractive and useful little rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My toes love this rug! It is soft like a baby rabbit's fur. I have it next to my bed so I can get of the bed onto something soft before putting my slippers on. I love carpet but it is so hard to keep clean but with this, I can throw it in the washing machine and dryer. It is also easy to sweep off to clean form light dirt and such. The color is great. I love this rug and highly recommend it.
